trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data members from the current component's selected data source.
trans-unit.target: 提供型別轉換子，可從目前元件的選取資料來源擷取資料成員清單。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataMemberConverter> provides methods that can retrieve a list of data members from the current data source of a design-time component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataMemberConverter> 提供方法，可以擷取從目前的資料來源的設計階段元件的資料成員的清單。

trans-unit.source: This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data members in the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 此型別轉換子正由[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]提供出現在清單中的資料成員屬性 視窗中的值。

trans-unit.source: You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示要轉換的來源型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the converter can convert an object of the specified source type to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示轉換器是否可以將指定來源型別中的物件轉換成轉換器原生型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個轉換器可以執行轉換，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to meet your own conversion requirements.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，以符合您自己的轉換需求。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="context" /> parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment the converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" />參數可以用來擷取轉換器會從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: It might be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 它可能是<see langword="null" />，因此請務必檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties of the <paramref name="context" /> object might also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，屬性<paramref name="context" />物件也可能會傳回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that can be used to support localization features.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，可用來支援當地語系化功能。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換成轉換子的原生型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the specified object after conversion.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示轉換後的指定物件。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行轉換作業。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to meet your own conversion requirements.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，以符合您自己的轉換需求。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="context" /> parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment the converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" />參數可以用來擷取轉換器會從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: It might be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 它可能是<see langword="null" />，因此請務必檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties of the <paramref name="context" /> object might also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，屬性<paramref name="context" />物件也可能會傳回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object indicating the component or control to get values for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，表示要取得值的元件或控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data members present within the selected data source, if information about them is available.
trans-unit.target: 當資料來源可取用時，取得該資料來源中的資料成員。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> listing the data members of the data source selected for the component.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" />，列出針對元件所選的資料來源的資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The converter uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider> implementation of the associated component's designer to retrieve the current data source selection.
trans-unit.target: 使用轉換器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider>實作來擷取目前的資料來源選取範圍關聯的元件設計工具。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> is a list of all possible values.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> 所傳回的標準值集合是否為所有可能值的清單。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> returned from <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> is an exclusive list of all possible values that are valid; <see langword="false" /> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果從 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> 傳回的 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> 是所有可能有效值的獨佔清單，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果可能為其他的值，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法永遠傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果是獨占清單 (例如在列舉資料型別中)，則沒有其他有效值。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單不是獨占，則沒有其他有效值除了標準的清單值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>提供。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要轉換的型別支援標準值，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="context" /> parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 <paramref name="context" /> 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。

trans-unit.source: It might be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 它可能是<see langword="null" />，因此請務必檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties of the <paramref name="context" /> object might also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，屬性<paramref name="context" />物件也可能會傳回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the converter supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個轉換子是否支援可以從清單中選取的標準值集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> 以尋找物件支援的通用值集合，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個實作永遠會傳回 <see langword="true" />。
